net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.tools.modifier

Class IncreaseFlatAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.tools.modifier.IncreaseFlatAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModifierAction

    public class IncreaseFlatAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModifierAction
    Increases all values by a flat amount. If the resulting value exceeds 1.0 it will use 1.0.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double increaseAmount
      A flat amount by which all properties of all drivers in grid should ve increased.

        public double performAction(double driverProperty)

        Specified by:
